query.query_text: SELECT repo_name, COUNT(*) watch_count FROM [githubarchive:month.201605], [githubarchive:month.201604], [githubarchive:month.201603], [githubarchive:month.201602], [githubarchive:month.201601] WHERE type='WatchEvent' GROUP BY 1 HAVING watch_count >= 2 ORDER BY watch_count DESC LIMIT 400000
SELECT * FROM `bigquery-public-data.github_repos.sample_repos` order by watch_count limit 10
